casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: A.R., D.G., T.G. No. 121P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, for Robeson, Jasmine. Mercedes O. Chut, Attorney at Law, for Guilford County DSS. Danielle Caldwell, Attorney at Law, for Smith, Antione. Matthew Wunsche, Attorney at Law, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th of April 2018 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
